description: Add only attribute for journey step group request.

Journeys_Step_GroupObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Journeys_Step_GroupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Journeys_Step_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Journey_Step_Group_Data.description: The unique reference ID for the journey step group.

Journey_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Journey_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Journey_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Journey_Step_Group_Data.description: The journey category reference ID or the Workday ID for the journey step group.
The name for the step group.
The journey step group description within the journey step group.
The description field within the journey step group.

Journey_Step_Group_Step_Data.description: The reference ID for the step, including the step attributes.
The placement order of the step within the step group.

Journey_Step_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Journey_Step_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Journey_Step_Group_Step_Data.description: The step type of the journey step.

Journey_Step_Enableable__All_Object.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Journey_Step_Enableable__All_ObjectID.type: WID,  articleID,  Journey_Text_ID,  Journey_Video_ID,  Learning_Course,  Learning_Course_ID,  Learning_Lesson_ID,  Quicklink__Metadata__ID,  Quicklink_ID,  SAML_SSO_Link

Journey_Step_Enableable__All_Object.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

The step description for the step.

Journey_Step_Group_Step_Data.description: The calculated due date for a step.

validation.validation: Specify a due date with a recipient type that matches the journey category recipient type. This recipient type is invalid: [duedatetype].

Journey_Step_Group_Step_Data.description: True if the step group is required to complete the journey.

validation.validation: Submit a step display name that isn't already in use by this step group.  [stepDisplayName]
The Web Service is set to Add Only, but the Journey Step Group Item already exists: [existingRefID]
Step group order must be unique. [stepOrder]
The step display name can't be changed on a distributed step: [stepDisplayName]
The step action can't be changed on a distributed step: [stepDisplayName]
The step type can't be changed on a distributed step: [stepDisplayName]

description: The data within a journey step group instance.
